entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 11:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C

Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %

Dewpoint: -6.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow with risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
